original_text: “For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: I am about to deliver you into the hands of those you hate, to those you turned away from in disgust.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 나는 네가 미워하는 자와 네 마음에 싫어하는 자의 손에 너를 붙이리니

sentences.original_text: For this is what the Sovereign Lord says:
I am about to deliver you
into the hands of those you hate,
to those you turned away from in disgust.
